long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The MeowMonitor chrome extension monitors any camera that you view on the meow.camera website and notifies you when there is movement on said camera by playing a beeping noise. The extension works in the background so you can do something else while waiting for a kitty to show up at the feeder. You can also open multiple instances of the meow.camera website to monitor multiple cameras at once.
